thread.section_title: Odeon Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent location, perfect service!
thread.title_full: Excellent location, perfect service! - Review of Odeon Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Viacheslav L
title: Excellent location, perfect service!
text:
I and my wife stayed in Odeon hotel several times. We like it's very very good location and friendly staff. This hotel is not very modern and not very new inside but Odeon hotel gives good comfort for reasonable price. Odeon hotel rather traditional French hotel.
We very appreciate also location of hotel:on the opposite side of hotel very popular cafe Hibou with good coctail list, near cafe - a very good cave "Ambassade de bourgogne", if you move towards subway Odeon on rite side you can see two excelent tapas bars "Avant de Comptoir" (fish and meatspecialized) with very good selection of wines.
Room Tip: Chambre Double Sup√©rieure or upper level (for example 528) See more room tips
